title: Pesticide Storage | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Understanding chemical storage for landowners and homeowners.
subtasks: Recognizing the importance of limited access to chemicals.
Considering the safety of youth and animals around chemicals.
Storing chemicals by category (e.g., insecticides vs. herbicides).
Keeping chemicals in their original containers.
Preventing chemicals from being stored in food containers.
Properly storing personal protective equipment separately.
